6.heading: Le Local. English.
6.title: Garage Band
6.author: Gipi ; translation by Spectrum.
notes: "Originally published in France in 2005 under the title Le Local by Gallimard Jeunesse, Paris"

Summary (from OCLC): Four troubled boys, Guiliano, Stefano, Alberto, and Alex, form a band. They practice in a garage that Guilano's dad loaned them. When their amp blows right before the deadline for their demo tape, the boys become desperate to replace it and land themselves in more trouble than they know how to handle.

50.heading: Locator Signals.
50.title: "Operación: Cebo Helado" p. 25-30 in Kraken, by Antonio Segura and Jordi Bernet
50.author: [No author]
notes: Summary: Scientists bring three frozen human corpses with locator signals in them, into the sewers to use as bait to catch the Kraken. The corpses are distributed, and soon the first one, the body of a young woman, is seen by their instruments to be in motion. Instead of the Kraken, they find an old proletarian soldier has taken her for companionship. The soldier has been hiding in the sewer and is still fighting a class war that ended fifty years earlier.
